title: Mini-Ep 80: Afternoon Delight
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 80: Afternoon Delight
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate hear from a listener about their favorite vibrator, lend advice to an archaeologist wondering how to approach their skincare routine as an afternoon shower-er, and give tips to a mom with young children who wants to make time for self-ca...
description:
Doree and Kate hear from a listener about their favorite vibrator, lend advice to an archaeologist wondering how to approach their skincare routine as an afternoon shower-er, and give tips to a mom with young children who wants to make time for self-care.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Nothing Much Happens - To get started on your peaceful sleep journey, search for and subscribe to Nothing Much Happens wherever you listen to podcasts.
  • ThirdLove - Visit thirdlove.com/forever to get 15% off your first purchase.
  • Native - For 20% off your first purchase, visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.
  • AWAY - For $20 off a suitcase visit awaytravel.com/serums and use promo code serums at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
